name: Help (Sunset Rollercoaster 落日飞车 Remake)
intro:
前几天刚释出与 HYUKOH（혁오）的合作单曲“Candlelight”的落日飞车 sunset rollercoaster 又再度发表另一首remake作品“Help”。这次飞车重置的是收录在 HYUKOH（혁오）今年初的专辑 사랑으로 （through love）里的一首作品Help。有别于原曲正统派的轻松写意、舒服朴实而不华的聆听享受，落日飞车在编曲上又添增了属于飞车独有的迷幻浪漫音色和风流不羁的节拍。

『在创作 “help” 的过程充满了爱与乐趣，我们试着加了很多迷幻和 new wave 的元素进去，希望大家会喜欢。 HYUKOH（혁오）真是太赞了，help 是一首超棒的作品！』

——落日飞车 sunset rollercoaster 国国

Produced by Yuchain Wang 王昱辰

Arranged by Sunset Rollercoaster 落日飞车, YELLOW 黄宣 & Yuchain Wang 王昱辰

Recorded & mixed by Yuchain Wang 王昱辰 @Morisound Studio, Taipei

Mastered by Yuchain Wang 王昱辰 @Morisound Studio, Taipei

Vocals, Acoustic Guitars, Electric Guitars, Percussions, Synthesizer - Kuo Hung Tseng 曾国宏

Vocals - YELLOW 黄宣

Synth Bass, Electric Bass - Hung Li Chen 陈弘礼

Synthesizers, Keyboards - Shao Hsuan Wang 王少轩

Drums - Tsun Lung Lo 罗尊龙

Saxophones - Hao Ting Huang 黄浩庭

Programming, sampling - Yuchain Wang 王昱辰

Contains vocal samples of 'Help' by HYUKOH

Original song 'Help' by HYUKOH [through love]

songs.name: Help (Sunset Rollercoaster 落日飞车 Remake)
